name: Paranoia (itch) (StronkTenk, xirothehero, crimecommitter)
description:
The Story

Late into the night, a girl wanders through an unforgiving and dangerous maze trying to return home.

A raccoon, who would do anything for food, patrols the area.

2-Player PvP, Turn-based Game

Player 1: Human

  • Goal: Return home
  • Abilities: Paranoia + Interact with items

Player 2: Raccoon

  • Goal: Steal her food
  • Abilities: Increased mobility + visibility

The Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to walk

F to interact with items (human only, once per turn)

Paranoia

After every turn, the human's paranoia will increase the more she stays in the dark, and decrease in the light.

The more paranoid she is, the further she can run but the less she can see.

Team Members:

Jaime Cervantes - Mentor

Robert Guan - Gameplay Programmer

Ali Kedwaii - Sound Designer

Courtney Huynh - UI Programmer

Christian MacNeill - 3D Artist

Isabelle Aventa - 2D Artist

https://github.com/robertyguan/untitled-raccoon-game
